content: **crocheted orange / tangerine hat for baby in drops babymerino piece is worked top down with stem and leaves size 0 - 4 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see little fern romper pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-144-by yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years head circumference approx 34/38 - 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 48/50 - 52/52 cm **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50-50 50-100 g colour 56 tangerine 50-50-50-50 50-50 g colour 38 olive **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 double crochets in width and 26 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/45-10-little-fern-romper
